title: Democrats are Weird. With Newt Gingrich and Pedro Gonzales
itunes:title: Democrats are Weird. With Newt Gingrich and Pedro Gonzales
description:
In this episode of The Charlie Kirk Show, Charlie is joined by Former Speaker of the House, Newt Gingrich, to game out how the midterms are shaping. What is the messaging approach Conservatives should take as Democrats continue down a path of wokeness, that ultimately just leads to weirdness? He also brings on Senior Writer and Associate Editor of Chronicles Magazine, Pedro Gonzales, to unpack several issues in the country today, including America’s involvement in the Russia/Ukraine conflict while completely neglecting crises on the homefront.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
